Good Omens.name: Good Omens
Good Omens.flavor: You peer into the future and predict good fortune for you and your allies.
Good Omens.effect: Each target gains a +5 power bonus to all d20 rolls until the end of your next turn, but cannot score a critical hit while this power is in effect.

Hammer of Fate.name: Hammer of Fate
Hammer of Fate.flavor: You assail your foe with words of power. If your foe avoids the barrage, you can untangle the lines of fate and perform a different action.
Hammer of Fate.onMiss: Neither this power nor the standard action is expended. You can take a different standard action during this turn, but you canâ€™t use this power again until your next encounter.

Prophecy of Doom.name: Prophecy of Doom
Prophecy of Doom.flavor: You predict dire results for your enemy.
Prophecy of Doom.effect: You or an ally who hits the target with an attack can choose to make the attack a critical hit. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn or until you or an ally uses it to make an attack a critical hit.
